typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		metadata_storage_content_type as string,
		metadata_storage_size as string,
		metadata_storage_last_modified as string,
		metadata_storage_content_md5 as string,
		metadata_storage_name as string,
		metadata_storage_path as string,
		metadata_content_type as string,
		metadata_language as string,
		metadata_author as string,
		metadata_title as string,
		metadata_creation_date as string,
		merged_content as string,
		pages as (Entities as (Entity as string, EntitySubType as string, EntityType as string, Url as string)[], keyPhrases as string[], Page as string)[],
		Images as (Images as (height as string, imgdata as (width as string, height as string, originalWidth as string, originalHeight as string, rotationFromOriginal as string, contentOffset as string, pageNumber as string, contentType as string), originalHeight as string, originalWidth as string, tags as (confidence as double, hint as string, name as string)[], text as string, width as string), layoutText as (language as string, text as string, lines as (boundingBox as (x as string, y as string)[], text as string)[], words as (boundingBox as (x as string, y as string)[], text as string)[]))[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CogSearchProjections
source(output(
		PageId as long,
		Entity as string,
		EntitySubType as string,
		EntityType as string,
		Url as string,
		EntityId as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> EntityLookup
CogSearchProjections keyGenerate(output(DocumentId as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> DocumentKey
DocumentKey select(mapColumn(
		DocumentId,
		metadata_storage_content_type,
		metadata_storage_size,
		metadata_storage_last_modified,
		metadata_storage_content_md5,
		metadata_storage_name,
		metadata_storage_path,
		metadata_content_type,
		metadata_language,
		metadata_author,
		metadata_title,
		metadata_creation_date,
		merged_content
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDocs
DocumentKey foldDown(unroll(pages),
	mapColumn(
		metadata_storage_name,
		DocumentId,
		pages,
		PageContent = pages.Page
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenPages
FlattenPages select(mapColumn(
		DocumentId,
		metadata_storage_name,
		Page = PageContent,
		pages
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectPage
SelectPage keyGenerate(output(DocPageId as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 select(mapColumn(
		DocumentId,
		DocPageId,
		pages
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
SurrogateKey1 select(mapColumn(
		metadata_storage_name,
		DocumentId,
		Page,
		DocPageId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select1 foldDown(unroll(pages.Entities),
	mapColumn(
		DocumentId,
		DocPageId,
		each(pages.Entities, match(true()))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Aggregate1, EntityLookup lookup(Aggregate1@Entity == EntityLookup@Entity
	&& Aggregate1@EntitySubType == EntityLookup@EntitySubType
	&& Aggregate1@EntityType == EntityLookup@EntityType,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(EntityLookup@Entity, true),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> EntityLookupMerge
EntityLookupMerge split(isNull(EntityId) ||  EntityId == 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(NewEntities, ExistingEntities)
Select3 keyGenerate(output(EntityKey as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> EntityKey
Flatten1 aggregate(groupBy(DocumentId,
		Entity,
		EntitySubType,
		EntityType,
		Url),
	entCount = count()) ~> Aggregate1
ConditionalSplit1@NewEntities select(mapColumn(
		DocumentId,
		Entity = ConditionalSplit1@NewEntities@Entity,
		EntitySubType = ConditionalSplit1@NewEntities@EntitySubType,
		EntityType = ConditionalSplit1@NewEntities@EntityType,
		Url = ConditionalSplit1@NewEntities@Url,
		entCount,
		PageId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
SelectDocs sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DocumentSink
Select2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DocPageSink
EntityKey sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> EntitiesSink
